Package net.chaossquad.mclib.combattracking

Class PlayerFight

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.combattracking.PlayerFight
public class PlayerFight extends Object
Represents a fight against one player. You can use {@link this#getStats()} to get the damaged caused by all players against the player that was damaged. You can use {@link this#getKiller(PlayerFight)} to get the player with the most damage, and {@link this#getAssistants(PlayerFight, UUID)} to get all players that dealt damage and are not the killer.
